DataElement.preferredName: Current Clinical Hematologic Method Disease or Disorder Status Assessment Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time._Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity._Pertaining to or related to the blood and blood-forming organs._A means, manner of procedure, or systematic course of actions that have to be performed in order to accomplish a particular goal._Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._A condition or state at a particular time._The act of judging the value, significance, or extent of something._The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._A condition or state at a particular time._The act of judging the value, significance, or extent of something.
